questions.question: What is the main topic of the session?
According to the McKinsey report, how many people in the US are lacking expertise in big data?
What is one key characteristic of machine learning?
options: It requires explicit programming for each task.
It uses data to detect patterns and adjust actions.
It only works with small datasets.
questions.answer: It uses data to detect patterns and adjust actions.

questions.question: Which company is mentioned as using machine learning for face recognition and friend suggestions?
What percentage increase in accuracy did Uber see in delivery and pickup after implementing machine learning?
